Description:
IntroductionYour Role and ResponsibilitiesSoftware Developer position for IBM SSW team. This professional will immerse in a innovative, dynamic and technical work environment, working side-by-side with experienced and bright professionals towards a common goalAct as a Software Development Engineer, responsible for understanding product functionalities, requirements, defects and enhancements to deliver these on new releases and patches, he /she will be involved in the software development cycle, requirements review, coding, test, test automation and client support. DevOps, SRE and Security are others areas that he or she will be engaged as part of daily work.Work on a daily basis with Product Owners, Architects, Release Managers and Engineering Manager, Other internal Teams, Sales, Business Partners in order to guide the productâ€™s development.Proactively seek for improvements opportunities and innovation that matters by learning new technologies and methods that can positively impact the products.Required Technical and Professional Expertise2+ -5 years working as Software Developer.
Functional test creation;
Software test phases and principles;
Worked on various technologies like: Selenium Web Driver; Mobile testing / APPIUM;
Continuous Delivery process. White box testing and Black box testing
Unit Testing, Skill in Mobile test automation
Cypress, Skill in Performance, Load and Stress test
JAVA, JavaScript, React, XML, JSON, SQL / NoSQL Database
Oracle, SQLServer and DB2
Open Shift, Kubernetes, Eclipse
Github, Jenkins, Docker
Shell Script, TravisPreferred Technical and Professional ExpertiseAgile development experience including using Github/Jira
Communication and teamwork collaboration
IBM Maximo Technical skills

Apache Cordova, Cordova plugins
